name: Garlic Masked Potatoes
author: Sara Snider

ingredients.name: med. baking potatoes - peeled & coarsely chopped
TBL. (OR none) whole milk @ room temp or warm

instructions: In med. sauce pan, cook potatoes in salted water, until tender (about 15 mins.). Drain potatoes & return to the saucepan. Add butter, sour cream, & garlic. Mash potatoes w/ fork or masher until blanded. Add milk - 1 TBL at a time until the potatoes are the desired consistency. Salt & pepper to taste
